purpose: Explain the role of Data and MIS in fraud management.
title: Data and MIS is a critical component in understanding fraud performance – all based on data

bullets.text: Investigates new patterns of emerging threats using confirmed fraud transactions and authorization patterns.
Identifies new compromises through point of compromise (POC) analysis; feedback loop to operations and rules development analysts to inform of new trends and threats.
Develops and maintains authorization rules based on statistically valid analysis that adheres to organization’s risk appetite.
Rules should be managed daily to tweak based on current threats and changing performance of each rule.
Outbound and inbound center that reviews fraud alerts, contacts customers and responds to customer calls through a combination of manual and automated interaction.
